Text:
YES, this is the full CD-iso, with movies and certain additional sounds (I think), the one available at HotU is a crack. Also, the full CD version is usually simpler to get to work with the Historical Earth Patch.

This iso is also available for direct download at:
http://86.106.27.51/isoart/Old%20Links/Oct%2011%202006/isolist_pg1.html

Sweet played this game many years ago and realy liked it.
Never remember the name of it.
Tanking now hope i get it fast :)
Thanks for the upload!
There, should be at least one more seeder now.
Fisko: dont use vista you fucktard.  jesus people are so fucking stupid.

Vista will comengetus , sooner or later. Anyhow, the game is made for win 95/98. So to install it in XP you need to right-click on the SETUP.EXE (on the CD), choose 'properties', choose 'compability', and in the drop down box set the compability for win 95/98. I have not tested the game in Vista and do not know if compability mode is available there.

- Arand

Fisko: or download Virtual PC 2007 from http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=04D26402-3199-48A3-AFA2-2DC0B40A73B6&displaylang=en and make virtual pc, install win95 or 98 install game and play :)

Aint able to seed now, unfortunately, being behind BT-restrictive firewall...

The instructions for installation described here are only for installation in Windows XP (using win98 emulation).

I frankly don't know how to install it in Windows 98 but I think it is supposed to just work there, as far as I remember, win98 was awhile ago now...
